text: The Birmingham Railway Carriage and Wagon Company (BRC&W;) was a railway locomotive and carriage builder, founded in Birmingham, England. For most of its existence, it was at nearby Smethwick, with the factory divided by the boundary between the two places. The company was established in 1854. ==References== Category:British rail vehicles manufacturers Category:Organisations based in Birmingham
title: Birmingham Railway Carriage and Wagon Company
